name: DRAGONBALL Z THE LEGACY OF GOKU
summary: Dragon Ball Z: The Legacy of Goku is the first title in the series, and was released in the United States on May 14, and in Europe on October 4, 2002. The game covers the story of Dragon Ball Z up until the destruction of Planet Namek. Goku is the only playable character. It is also one of the first GBA games to feature full motion video.
